stories.text:
A lot of Medium links I end up landing on seem to be really poorly-written and poorly-researched.

The paywall really irritates me and I really wonder how content creators feel.

Is anyone making any money from Medium (aside of Medium themselves)?

Further, a lot of out-of-band commentary seems to focus on how Medium is just a dumping ground of trashy content.

What happened and how do we escape this?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why has Medium become such a trash fire?

stories.text:
Hey HN,

Just doing some database window shopping for a financial application and curious if anyone has used the NewSQL databases such as (FaunaDB, CockroachDB, YugabyteDB, ArangoDB, MemSQL/SingleStoreDB and others I haven't mentioned) in production?

Bonus if you have any learnings or findings after using them in production.

Thanks.
stories.title: Ask HN: Have you used NewSQL Databases in Production in 2022?
